section.title: Adding the Management Interface for an IPMI Host

procedure.title: To Add the Management Interface for an IPMI Host

step.para: In Basic Information, type in a Name and the IPMI IP address.
In the Credentials area, under IPMI tab, type in the IPMI credentials
step.remark: What about other fields? are they optional? JW

step.para: Use User ID to specify a login ID.
Use Password to specify the password for the User ID.
Use Verify Password to confirm the password.
Click Validate to test the credentials.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The IPMI host is added to the CloudForms Management Engine environment; an operating system can now be provisioned onto it.
